rows.label: tlk70000047_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Bless me, I never thought this
day would come. It's like a dream.

rows.label: tlk70000047_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I shall make the most of every day
with my daughter from now on. I don't
have words to thank your lordships.

rows.label: tlk70000047_05_msg0003
tlk70000047_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I want more time with her.
I want to regain the time we lost
because of her illness.

rows.label: tlk70000047_05_msg0005
rows.name:
But after Iira's awakening, I
wonder if that's possible. Who
knows how much time we have left?

rows.label: tlk70000047_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Protect my daughter's future.
The fate of her and everyone else
in Iira rests in your hands.
